spec_data.Name: pyserial
spec_data.Description:
This module encapsulates the access for the serial port. It provides backends
for standard Python running on Windows, Linux, BSD (possibly any POSIX
compilant system) and Jython. The module named "serial" automaticaly selects
the appropriate backend.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:20:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
